title: The Long Wait of the Dragon
brief_description: Sport and physical culture in the People’s Republic of China. Covers the variety of sports and the training undertaken, and considers their readiness for the 1984 Olympic Games now that the International Olympic Committee has invited them to return to the Olympic movement
